verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
It is You it is You
It is You that I love
It is You my Lord and King
I apprehend to know and follow

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
You it is You
It is You that I worship
Holy holy
Worthy yes You're worthy
How I love You Lord

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
It is You it is You
It is You that we love
It is You our Lord and King
We apprehend to know and follow

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines:
You it is You
It is You that we worship
Holy holy
Worthy yes You're worthy
How we love You Lord
